text: Lauren Emma Drummond (born 23 December 1987) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the roles of Mika Grainger in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2006–2008, 2024), and Chantelle Lane in the BBC medical drama series Holby City (2011–2013, 2016). ==Other websites== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: Lauren Drummond
